projects.desc: Developed fun and interesting projects including a decentralized social network system built on IPFS, a Bitcoin Lightning Network donation invoice system for a website, a captcha solving game for 4chan users, a hosted Bitcoin wallet that can be interacted with using touch tone telephone, and this CV in React.
